title: Laws Concerning Vows
summary: Numbers 30 lays out the seriousness of making vows to the Lord. It explains when vows must be kept and when they may be nullified, especially in the case of women under a father or husband’s authority.

faq.question: What does this chapter say about vows?
faq.answer: Anyone who makes a vow to the Lord must not break it—it must be fulfilled.

faq.question: Can a woman’s vow be canceled?
faq.answer: Yes, by her father or husband if they object when they first hear of it.
